name: Vasarelyan Geometric Pattern SPEIELOBJEKT 1
description:
[24-03-20]
Inspired by the patterns made by Victor Vasarely, I saw the movement and made it into a seamless looping generative system to output animated tribute.

[25-03-20]
Posting OG gif on Giphy

Minting this 1:1 | 800x800 | 360 frames | 50 fps
